动力场 Player one : Arrow keys Player two : Keyboard letters

An abstract cooperative platformer experience
By Pierre Bernon, Colin Thil and Zhaoran Li(李昭然)
Made for the 48h game jam Ceci n'est pas un jeu
Original soundtrack by Baptiste Petit.
Additional sounds made with Bfxr.

Download the executable version for better frame rate and physics.
